attributes.additional_details:
The time has come where we need the Government to step in and intervene on Daniel Hutchinson making a grave error of judgement.

He is seemingly moving to Oman in the Middle East, hell bent on changing his life for the worse. He faces racial prejudice, hatred, too much heat, bad company, a life of being whipped and beaten, a slave to his master.

If we can get just 100,000 people sign up we can force this issue in the House of Commons, something I think you'll agree is becoming a necessity.
